section.heading: Notification requirement.

para.text: Each school shall notify all parents or guardians of students attending the school whenever it receives notice that a student who attends in-person learning at the school or a staff member who physically works at the school tests positive for the COVID-19 virus.
A school shall be deemed to have complied with paragraph (1) of this subsection if the school's LEA provides the notification on the school's behalf.
The identity of the individual who has tested positive for the COVID-19 virus shall not be disclosed in a notification provided pursuant to paragraph (1) of this subsection.
The notification required in subsection (a) of this section may be electronic.
